page.title: 13A Typical Day in our Life 2.
page.content: In{summer}we can{play leapfrog.}We come in at{10.30}then change our{shoes for{assembly.}On{Tuesdays}we have{Hymn {Practice.}We come back from{Hymn {Practice}and do some more work,{maths and writing a{story.}We have{dinner {play or dinner at 12.00.}Then we go in for{dinner}and the others come out to {play.}My best{packed lunch}is {chocolate spread sandwiches.}For {cooked dinner}we have{fish and chips, and for{pudding}we have{sponge}and {custard.}Then we take our{plates, {knives}and{forks}to be{washed up.}Then we go out to{play.}We play{horses.}At {1.25}we come in and take our{coats off and do some more work like{Guide Lines and{art}and{craft.}We have one more {play}at{2.30.}We go on the{grass}and play{princesses.}Then we come in again at{2.45}and take off our{coats.}We hear a{story}about{Plop.
